components.description: Pro Max 3-finger alloy with reach adjust
SR Suntour FD-XR05 31.8 down pull (F), Shimano Altus CT-95 (R)
FPD with toe clips and strap
Schwinn N'Litened Silver Label Custom Drawn Alloy Frame w/ Bio-Tuned Geometry
Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components with anatomical design
Alloy suspension with micro adjust head, pre-load adjust with 35mm travel 27.2 x 330mm
Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components anatomical design handle bar ends
